name: Grape Valley Kush
description: Grape Valley Kush is an indica-dominant cross of SFV OG and Grape Kush bred by Moxie Seeds. The earthy aroma of this strain mixes with flavors of pine and sweet citrus to bring on full-bodied relaxation with a hint of social energy that makes this strain good for relaxing with friends in your down time.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Hungry, Creative, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Muscle Spasms, Inflammation, Depression
